base_description: Gray, octagonal pump bottle with a spout.
part_description: Consists of a cylindrical body with an octagonal top, featuring a pump mechanism and spout. The pump is centrally positioned on the top surface.
internal_interaction_description: The pump mechanism interacts with the liquid inside the bottle, drawing it up through the internal tube when pressed. The spout directs the liquid outwards efficiently.
external_interaction_description: The pump bottle is designed for manual operation, requiring a downward press to dispense liquid. It can be placed on flat surfaces and is commonly used for dispensing soap or lotion.
